crypto.name: boggart
crypto.desc:
Welcome to another Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson.

Today I will show you a new powerful charm — Riddikulus. Enjoy!

crypto.name: horcrux
crypto.desc:
Imagine that you are a dark wizard (as dark as Voldemort). And you want to reach immortality.

What could be your plan?

crypto.name: phoenix
crypto.desc:
If you want to become a member of the Order of the Phoenix, you need to:

    be able to perfectly control the magic wand
    be able to crack the following cipher

...but maybe some of this is not needed

hardware.name: BoatLouder
hardware.desc:
I use this boatlouder.hex to load firmware into my new PIC18F452 (OSC 8MHz). But unfourtunately I lost the sources.

Containers will restart every 15 minutes.

Please enter the server only to check your solution.

hardware.name: Scheme
hardware.desc: Someone left this scheme here but I can't understand what it doing.

pwn.name: HouseBuilder
pwn.desc:
We made an application for creating our own houses and selling them.

Everything seems to be safe, don't you think so?

flag in /tmp/flag.txt

pwn.name: ShellMaster
pwn.desc:
Prove that you are a real shell master

flag in /tmp/flag.txt

pwn.name: ShellMaster2
pwn.desc: Another task for the shellcode master

rev.name: BashD00R
rev.desc:
There seems to be something wrong with our bash.

Can you see if anyone has entered the backdoor?

rev.name: Dummyper
rev.desc:
This stupid program has encrypted our flag.

We only have a dump left.
